parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests an attempt at electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used by candidates and are mandated for electoral materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name or surname, the call to "NU VOTAȚI O ILUZIE CREATĂ DE INTELIGENȚĂ ARTIFICIALĂ" and the overall tone strongly suggest an attempt to influence voters against a particular candidate or party perceived as using AI-generated propaganda.  The final statement "Eu vreau să rămân în EUROPA!" hints at a political stance, further suggesting a connection to the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently targeting a wide audience. The message is not a private communication but is designed to reach many people through a public platform.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post appears to be influencing voters' choices in the parliamentary elections. The repeated calls to "NU VOTAȚI" and the critique of AI-generated illusions strongly suggest an attempt to dissuade voters from supporting a specific candidate or party. The message aims to create a negative perception of a certain type of political communication, implicitly influencing the vote.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. While it presents a narrative, it lacks objectivity and is clearly intended to persuade rather than inform. The emotional language and subjective opinions presented do not align with neutral reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Although the post is framed as a personal anecdote, its clear intention is not merely to express a personal opinion but to sway public opinion against a particular type of political campaign. The narrative serves as a vehicle for delivering a political message aimed at influencing the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>913307383785120</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post exhibits characteristics of electoral propaganda. The presence of a CMF number, the clear attempt to influence voters against a certain type of campaign (implicitly against specific candidates), the use of a paid Facebook advertisement to reach a wide audience, and the lack of journalistic objectivity all point towards a violation.  While no specific candidate is named, the indirect nature of the attack, coupled with the clear political message and the use of paid advertising, makes it highly likely that this post aims to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections. The argument that it's a personal opinion is weak, given the clear political context and the use of paid advertising to disseminate the message.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Unspecified</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alexandru Rogobete, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 913307383785120) cu conținut electoral, care îndeamnă la nevotarea unor candidați neprecizați, dar identificați implicit prin critica utilizării inteligenței artificiale în campania electorală, având ca efect electoral influențarea negativă a votului, prin utilizarea unui mesaj emoțional și subiectiv, care nu respectă standardele jurnalistice obiective, și prin prezența unui număr CMF (CMF11240017), indicând clar natura electorală a postării.  Postarea, fiind o reclamă plătită pe Facebook, vizează o audiență largă, demonstrând intenția clară de a influența alegerile parlamentare.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
